pages.text: «hulachihumi honachihu keriswa wiredu፡፡ kenemi yehone memeriya bimet’alachihu wediyawinu memeriyayeni yeteketele sewi benesu layi firihati yelebachewimi፤ inesumi ayazinumi» alinachewi፡፡
ineziyami (bemelikitenyochachini) yekadu be’anik’ets’ochachinimi yasitebabelu ineziya ye’isati gwadochi nachewi፡፡ inerisu bewisit’wa zewitariwochi nachewi፡፡
ye’isira’eli lijochi hoyi! yachini benanite layi yelegesikwatini ts’egayeni asitawisu፡፡ bek’ali kidanemi mulu፤ bek’ali kidanachihu imolalehuna፤ inenimi bicha firu፡፡

kenanite gari yalewini (mets’ihafi) yemiyaregagit’i hono baweredikutimi (k’uri’ani) imenu፡፡ berisumi yemejemeriya kehadi atihunu፡፡ be’anik’ets’ochemi t’ik’itini waga atilewit’u፡፡ inenimi bicha tet’enik’ek’u፡
iwinetunimi bewisheti atik’elak’ilu፡፡ inanitemi yemitawik’u sitihonu iwinetini atidebik’u፡፡
solatinimi denibuni t’ebik’achihu sigedu፡፡ zekanimi (gideta mits’iwatini) sit’u፡፡ (legetachihu) ke’agonibashochi garimi agonibisu፡፡
inanite mets’ihafuni yemitanebu honachihu sewochini bebego sira tazalachihuni? nefisochachihunimi tiresalachihuni? (yesirachihuni met’ifoneti) atawik’umini
bemetagesina besolatimi teredu፡፡ iriswami (solati) beferiwochi layi iniji belelawi layi be’irigit’i kebadi nati፡፡
ineziya inerisu getachewini yemigenanyu inesumi wede’irisu temelashochi mehonachewini yemiyaregagit’u behonuti (layi iniji kebadi nati)፡፡

ye’isira’eli lijochi hoyi! yachini benanite layi yelegesikwatini ts’egayenina inemi be‘alemati layi yabelet’ikwachihu (abatochachihuni begizeyachewi keneberuti ‘alemati yabelet’ikuwachewi) mehoneni asitawisu፡፡
(maninyawa) nefisimi ke(lelawa) nefisi mininimi yematimenedabetini፣ keriswami milijani yemayik’ebelubatini፣ keriswami beza yemayiyazibetini፣ inerisumi yemayiredubetini k’eni tet’enik’ek’u፡፡
